prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek design and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a fish, with striking green and blue accents.
Show me a unique aquatic creature with distinct fins and a streamlined body.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by river fish, featuring a playful and curious demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ocean, with vivid colors and sharp features.
Design a Pokemon that swims gracefully, with patterns reminiscent of underwater flora.
Give me a depiction of a Pokemon that thrives in freshwater environments, showcasing its agility.
